argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_id | |- ( C e. Cat -> C e. Cat ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` C ) = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Hom ` C ) = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_zerooval | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( ZeroO ` C ) = ( ( InitO ` C ) i^i ( TermO ` C ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( O e. ( ZeroO ` C ) <-> O e. ( ( InitO ` C ) i^i ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elin | |- ( O e. ( ( InitO ` C ) i^i ( TermO ` C ) ) <-> ( O e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ O e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_initoo | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( O e. ( InitO ` C ) -> O e. ( Base ` C ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantrd | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( ( O e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ O e. ( TermO ` C ) ) -> O e. ( Base ` C ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl5bi | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( O e. ( ( InitO ` C ) i^i ( TermO ` C ) ) -> O e. ( Base ` C ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_sylbid | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( O e. ( ZeroO ` C ) -> O e. ( Base ` C ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_imp | |- ( ( C e. Cat /\ O e. ( ZeroO ` C ) ) -> O e. ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( C e. Cat /\ O e. ( Base ` C ) ) -> C e. Cat ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( C e. Cat /\ O e. ( Base ` C ) ) -> O e. ( Base ` C ) ) |
| 14 | 2, 3, 12, 13 | #P_iszeroo | |- ( ( C e. Cat /\ O e. ( Base ` C ) ) -> ( O e. ( ZeroO ` C ) <-> ( O e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ O e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_biimpd | |- ( ( C e. Cat /\ O e. ( Base ` C ) ) -> ( O e. ( ZeroO ` C ) -> ( O e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ O e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_impancom | |- ( ( C e. Cat /\ O e. ( ZeroO ` C ) ) -> ( O e. ( Base ` C ) -> ( O e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ O e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 16 | #P_jcai | |- ( ( C e. Cat /\ O e. ( ZeroO ` C ) ) -> ( O e. ( Base ` C ) /\ ( O e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ O e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) |
